Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: The daily gridded map of Absolute Dynamic Topography data is obtained from AVISO

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Remove the long wavelength component of the SSH anomaly and retain the mesoscale features with the wavelength 50-500 km scale.

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Identified outer most closed contour of SSH anomaly.

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: The closed contours are sequentially identified, analysed and checked essential criteria.

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Size and amplitude based thresholds for eddy detection were fixed after carrying out several trials.

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Eddies are detected and calculated the eddy parameters.

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Chelton, D. B., M. G. Schlax, R. M. Samelson, and R. A. de Szoeke (2007), Global observations of large oceanic eddies, Geophys. Res. Lett., 34, L15606, doi:10.1029/2007GL030812.

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: We have followed Chelton et. Al. 2007 in deriving the eddy census in Bay of Bengal with minor modifications in fixing the thresholds for eddy detection specific to this region. This was achieved after performing several trial experiments with different combinations of size and amplitude values.

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Accuracy assessment of the dataset has not been carried out. The number of eddies are depending upon the diameter and amplitude threshold. Only mesoscale eddies with maximum diameter of 400km are being considered.

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Less reliability of SSH data near the coast with altimetry is a known problem.

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: The typical file name is 'eddy_parameter_YYYY.nc' or ‘YYYY.gif’ where

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: 'eddy_parameter’ signifies that this product consists of eddy parameters.

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: 'YYYY' corresponds to the year, ex: 2015.

Page Title: Oceanic Eddies Detection | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: All the data files are in NetCDF 4 format and the images are in gif format.
